headline: Ask HN: Untainted International News Sources
description:
Hi!

In times like these it is interesting to get an insight into the sentiment in other countries and cultures. Of course there are a number of non-western news outlets broadcasting in English. E.q. South China Morning Post or Russia Today. Yet, I have the strong impression (or at least the suspicion) those institutions follow a specific agenda for their English recipients which doesn't align with the picture they paint when addressing their local audience.

In Germany we have a nationwide radio station called Deutschlandfunk (DLF) which delivers an international newsreel [1]. This is about the kind if content I have in mind. Unfortunately DLF is under public law so I'm not sure if it can be considered politically neutral, particularly when it comes to picking topics. Usually topics are being selected that somehow relate to current topics in local news or are affecting German citizens. But that's not a way to see what others see.

So, my question: Do you know a source for international news that...?

- ... deliveres 1:1 translations of local news on current topics

- ... picks topics in a not very tendentious way (which I believe is hard)

[1] https://www.deutschlandfunk.de/internationale-presseschau-100.html
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 未受污染的国际新闻来源
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 未受汙染的國際新聞來源
description_zh-Hans:
嗨！

在这样的时代，深入了解其他国家和文化的情绪是很有趣的。当然，也有一些非西方的新闻机构用英语广播。例如：《南华早报》或《今日俄罗斯》。南华早报或今日俄罗斯。然而，我有一个强烈的印象（或至少是怀疑），这些机构为他们的英语接收者遵循一个特定的议程，这与他们在向当地听众讲话时描绘的画面不一致。

在德国，我们有一个全国性的广播电台，名为Deutschlandfunk（DLF），提供国际新闻片[1]。这就是我心目中的那种内容。不幸的是，DLF受公法管辖，所以我不确定它是否可以被认为是政治中立的，特别是在选择主题时。通常情况下，所选择的话题都与当地新闻中的当前话题有关，或者影响到德国公民。但是，这并不是看到别人所看到的东西。

所以，我的问题。你知道有什么国际新闻来源......吗？

- ......提供1:1的本地新闻的时事话题翻译

- ......以一种不太有倾向性的方式挑选话题（我相信这很难）

[1] https://www.deutschlandfunk.de/internationale-presseschau-100.html
